title: Direction of energy from 3D electromagnetic wave

content.question: The figure above shows a model of an electromagnetic wave, where E is the electric field and B is the magnetic field. In what direction is the energy of the wave transmitted?

choices.label: In a direction that is at a nonzero angle to each of the axes
